DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study will utilize the experimental rhinovirus infection model to study changes in skin microbiota in relation to skin erythema and soreness.
DOC.brief_title: Rudolph: Nasal Microbiota With Red and Sore Nose
DOC.criteria: self reported proneness to developing symptoms of nose redness and/or soreness seronegative to HRV16 at screening confirmed or selfreported allergic rhinitis history of nasal or otologic surgery use of antiinflammatory medication, recent antibiotics or antihistamines
